pages.text: Dr. Colin McLear Office: 1003 Oldfather Hall Office Hours: Email: <!-- h='unl.edu';a='@';n='mclear';e=n+a+h; document.write('<a h'+'ref'+'="ma'+'ilto'+':'+e+'" clas'+'s="em' + 'ail">'+e+'<\/'+'a'+'>'); // --> mclear at unl dot edu Email is the best way to reach me. I answer emails on weekdays, usually within 24 hrs. Students, please check your syllabus or the assignments online before emailing your question. If it is covered in the syllabus, I likely won't respond. Please remember to include an informative subject line that summarizes the content of your email (e.g. "Question about Assignment 3 for PHIL101 ″ instead of "Question").
